content: these crochet slippers are super easy to make beginner friendly and oh so cozy they work up fast using a #6 super bulky yarn i used a 5mm and a 6mm hook excellet the pattern includes a full video tutorial on the slippers as well as a bonus tutorial if you want to put some no slip soles on your crochet slippers you re going to fall in love with this pattern when you make your own crochet slippers they are great for gifts as well skill easy notes this pattern uses english us terminology this pattern made as us women s shoe sizes 5/6 7/8 9/10 11/12 keep in mind these slippers can stretch a little so the sizes are flexible depending on how you want them to fit in the pictures i have demonstrated with size 7/8 yarn needed color a = 75 80 90 95 yards color b = 5 5 8 8 yards gauge 10 single_crochet x 11 5 rounds = 4 thank you for stopping by happy crocheting
